summary.span: 表示一个 列，该列在其单元格中承载 元素。

span.span: Represents a column that hosts elements in its cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以显示包含的数据，如 HTTP 地址或电子邮件地址。Use to display data that contains a , such as an HTTP address or email address. 下图显示的示例。The following illustration shows an example of a . ![电子邮件地址的 DataGridHyperlinkColumn](~/add/media/wpf-hyperlinkcolumn.png "电子邮件地址的 DataGridHyperlinkColumn")![DataGridHyperlinkColumn with email addresses](~/add/media/wpf-hyperlinkcolumn.png "DataGridHyperlinkColumn with email addresses") > [!NOTE] > 仅当任一时才可以进行导航的直接或间接父导航宿主。 navigation can only occur if either the direct or indirect parent of a is a navigation host. 导航主机的示例包括， ，或可以承载任何浏览器[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]，如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)]或更高版本和 Firefox 2.0 或更高版本。Examples of navigation hosts include , , or any browser that can host [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)], such as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)] or later and Firefox 2.0 or later. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"导航主机"主题[导航概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md)。For more information, see the "Navigation Hosts" topic in [Navigation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md). 若要填充列，将绑定到列使用数据属性。To populate the column, bind the column to the data by using the property. 若要显示不同的 URI 字符串的超链接文本，请将绑定到的文本值属性。To display hyperlink text that is different than the URI string, bind the text value to the property. 属性应用于或列中创建的元素。The property is applied to the or element created in the column. 单元格处于每个单元中的元素是行的数据项目。The for the element in each cell is the data item for the row the cell is in. 因此，若要将绑定设置你只需设置。Therefore, to set up the binding you only have to set the . 或者，可以指定如果你想要将数据转换。Optionally, you can specify a if you want to convert the data. 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf.md)。For more information about data binding, see [Data Binding (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf.md). > [!NOTE] > 创建非编辑模式中的元素和在编辑模式下的元素。 creates a element in the non-editing mode and a element in the editing mode. 如果你想要显示其他类型的数据，提供下列类型：If you want to display other types of data, provides the following column types: |列名称Column Type|数据显示Data Display| |-----------------|------------------| ||用于显示布尔数据。Use to display Boolean data.| ||用于显示枚举数据。Use to display enumeration data.| ||用于显示文本。Use to display text.| 如果你想要使用中的其他控件你，你可以通过创建自己的列类型。If you want to use other controls in your , you can create your own column types by using . ## Examples 下面的示例演示设置与属性并将超链接文本属性。The following example shows a that sets the with the property and the hyperlink text with the property. 事件将自动处理，因为父级的。The event is handled automatically because is the parent of the . [!code-xaml[DataGrid_CustomColumns#HyperlinkA](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml#hyperlinka)]
